heading: How high is the carbon footprint of each European citizen?
subheading: In 2022 the total greenhouse gas emissions per capita in the EU27 was 7.01 kt CO2 equivalent. A 6.78% decrease to the level of 2019.
textNote: Data viewer on greenhouse gas emissions and removals, sent by countries to UNFCCC and the EU Greenhouse Gas Monitoring Mechanism (EU Member States).
